title: how do i get a chest
body:
hi everyone. 

this season i didnt get any chests. in my profile they told me that i can get 4 chests. i played two games. one with jinx and the other with Ashe. and in both games i got an s ranking, but i didnt recive a chest. i played on summoner rift draft pick.  
**
here is some of the games i got an s in:**

http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1779571799/220751092?tab=overview

http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1779560374/220751092?tab=overview

replies.body: I checked this out for you, and it looks like you've already received a chest for Ashe and Jinx!  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, you can only receive one chest for a specific champion per season.  Hope that helps with clearing things up!
